header.headline: Three steps to your first exchange

items.title: Create Your Profile
items.description: Sign up with email or wallet. Add your photo, location, and a brief bio. Takes 2 minutes.

items.title: Set Your Value & Skills
items.description: Choose your hourly baseline. List what you can offer and what you're looking for.

items.title: Make Your First Exchange
items.description: Browse the community, find a match, and propose an exchange. Most people find their first match within a week.

items.question: What if I don't know my hourly value?
items.answer: Start with what feels fair. If you had a job, divide your salary by 2,000. If not, think about what someone would pay for your skill. You can always adjust later.

items.question: What if I only have one skill?
items.answer: That's totally fine! Many participants specialize. As long as someone needs what you offer, you can find exchanges.

items.question: How much time do I need to commit?
items.answer: Zero minimum. Exchange when it works for you. Some people do one exchange a month, others do several a week.

items.question: What if there's no one near me?
items.answer: Some skills work remotely! Tutoring, consulting, design‚Äîmany things can be done online. You can also help grow your local community.
